Qualitative methods will enrich this information by
identifying factors that influenced these changes,
including the delivery practices of Traditional Birth
Attendants.  Qualitative methods can assess the
social acceptability of these outcomes and how
they have affected the lives of the people in the
community.
Information to be collected should be kept to the
essential minimum and should always relate to what is
being evaluated.
